Trade/Device Name(s): i-STAT CG8+ cartridge with the i-STAT 1 System
Regulation Name(s): Blood Gases (PCO2, PO2) And Blood pH Test System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Abbott i-STAT CG8+ cartridge with the i-STAT 1 System for measurement of blood pH, PO2, and PCO2 in whole blood at point of care or clinical laboratory settings
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantification of pH, PO2, and PCO2 in arterial, venous, or capillary whole blood in point of care or clinical laboratory settings, to aid in diagnosis, monitoring, and treatment of respiratory, metabolic and acid-base disturbances
